entries.meaning: (informal, dated) One who speaks in an unclear, muffled, or sluggish manner.
examples: [Y]ou may detect your own "elderly" tricks—pushing your shoulders up around your ears, being a mumble-boy or a flannelmouth!

entries.meaning: (informal, dated) One who speaks in a glib manner with the intent of deceiving or manipulating others.
examples: Uncle Sedgwick, who is considered around and about as somewhat of a flannelmouth, has talked Drizzlepuss into going ice fishing. . . . Uncle can tell you some wonderful fish stories, but, boy, I've never known a guy who's so careless with the truth.
